Uses of Class
org.middleheaven.global.text.LocalizationDomainBundle

Packages that use LocalizationDomainBundle
org.middleheaven.global Global Toolbox Definition of Culture (similar to java.util.Locale) and CultureModel for definition of number and text formatting The global package is a wrapper around the java.text package for formatting but provided additional value like the Atlas Toolbox and the Address Toolbox 
org.middleheaven.global.text Culture dependent Formatter implementations.
